All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AngryMob
 
Application
Core class in charge of initializing the application's core components.
BlackCat
 
Broomstick
 
Card
This abstract class is extended by both Rumour cards and Identity cards.
CardSelectorController
Gathers user-input from an instance of DeckPanel (internal class of GamePanel) active on the Graphical User Interface.
CardValue
This class represents the value attributed to a Rumour card by a SINGLE CPU Player's strategy.
CardValueMap
Associates each instance of Rumour card with a Card value for a SINGLE CPUPlayer's chosen chosen strategy.
Cauldron
 
ChoiceButton
Button of a ChoicesPanel, used to collect user-input in order to choose an entry within a Menu.
ChoicesPanel
This class defines a visual representation for Menus on the GUI View.
ChoicesPanelController
Gathers user-input from an instance of ChoicesPanel active on the Graphical User Interface.
ConcreteDisplayMediator
Central class linking the application's 'model' and 'view' levels in terms of display.
ConcreteInputMediator
Central class connecting the application's 'model' and 'view' levels in terms of user-input.
CPUPlayer
This class represents a CPU-controlled player.
CPUStrategy
Concrete CPU strategy.
DeckSelectorButton
 
DeckSelectorButtonController
Gather user-input from a DeckSelectorButton of a DeckSelectorPanel (internal classes of GamePanel) active on the Graphical User Interface.
DefenseAction
This enum represents the possible actions a player can perform when they are accused or targetted by a Hunt! effect.
DefensiveStrategy
This strategy will be chosen by the CPUPlayer when they feel threatened : If the game is tied, if the leading players are far above in score, if this player has no cards left, or if this player plays as a witch and is not close to victory.
DisplayMediator
Interface implemented by the central display controller
DuckingStool
 
Effect
Defines behaviors that are common between Witch? effects and Hunt! effects.
EvilEye
 
ExistingRumourCards
Singleton containing a set of all existing Rumour cards.
Game
Core class giving access to the game and its options.
GamePanel
 
GridBagCell
A custom graphical component used to make non-homogeneous grids out of plural components.
GridBagPanel
An extension of JPanel managed by a GridBagLayout.
GropingStrategy
The initial strategy of all CPU-controlled players, and the one adopted when the situation is not clear enough to choose a more angular strategy.
GUIView
Central class of the GUI view.
HookedNose
 
HumanPlayer
This class represents a human-controlled player.
HuntEffect
A Hunt!
Identity
This enum represents the possible identities players can choose.
IdentityCard
Class representing an Identity cards.
InputMediator
Interface implemented by the central input controller
InputSource
Classes implementing this interface are supposed to be able to transmit data to an implementation of InputMediator.
InterruptibleStdInput
Non-blocking console input reader.
MainMenuPanel
The Main Menu scene.
MatchSetupPanel
The GUI Version of the match setup scene, displayed when the game was started.
Menu
Represents a menu with a title and plural choices.
Notification
Defines a notification to be displayed as a text message.
NotificationsBox
 
OffensiveStrategy
This strategy will be chosen by the CPUPlayer if they are in good position (score close to 5, well ranked, or has a lot of cards).
PetNewt
 
Player
This abstract class defines common behavior and specifies required abstract methods for both human and CPU players.
PlayerCreatorController
Gathers user-input from an instance of PlayerCreatorPanel active on the Graphical User Interface.
PlayerCreatorPanel
A set of regrouped graphical components used to create a player or represent an already created one on the GUI view.
PlayerDisplayRequester
Interface implemented by Player and its daughter classes.
PlayerInputRequester
Interface implemented by Players and their daughter classes
PlayStrategy
 
PointedHat
 
RenderedCard
 
Resettable
This interface is implemented by classes that can be reset.
Round
Class representing a round.
RumourCard
Represents a Rumour card.
RumourCardsPile
A pile of Rumour cards.
ScoreCounter
Class responsible for counting each player's score using the Visitor design pattern.
StdPlayerCreator
Used to create one instance of Player based on standard input.
StdView
Central class of the console view, responsible for console display.
Tabletop
Class playing a central role, aggregating all of Model's components and controlling the game's flow.
TheInquisition
 
Theme
Defines plural themes.
Toad
 
Turn
Class representing a single turn.
TurnAction
This enum represents the possible actions a player can perform during his turn.
Visitable
Generic interface implemented by visitable entities (Visitor Design Pattern).
Visitor
Generic interface implemented by entities that visit visitables entities.
Wart
 
Window
The window containing the extension of JPanel corresponding to the current scene.
WitchEffect
A Witch?
